content.title: HIT Management
content.definition: Stop all heparin, start non-heparin anticoagulant (argatroban, bivalirudin). Monitor platelet recovery.
content.statement: HIT Management is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Hit that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding HIT Management helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of HIT Management include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
